prompt: Generate a Conventional Commit message based on the diff below. Rules: Follow the Conventional Commits specification (type(scope): subject). Allowed types: feat, fix, chore, docs, refactor, perf, test, build, ci. Subject must be all lowercase. The entire commit message must not exceed 100 characters. Do not include a body. Do not include a footer. Do not include explanations. Output only the commit message. Diff: {{diff}}
